nodes.text: African organizations should be appreciated and

She had substantial physical disabilities needed to wear a special corset and required corrective surgery at some stage. That is expensive in this country but African organisations that are working with those children and saving them from otherwise certain death and putting them on the road to recovery are scratching around to find the money to provide a complex range of services and give those children a reasonable life.
We may not appreciate the enormous lengths to which some organisations go to try to save children from an early death and to improve their health.
If an organization are trying to save children they should be supported and appreciated
